meanings.sent1: She foreknows the outcome of the game before it even starts.
meanings.sent2: He always foreknows what his friends are going to say next.
meanings.sent3: The psychic foreknows the future, but struggles with remembering what she had for breakfast.
meanings.sent4: The old wise man foreknows the changes in the weather by observing the behavior of animals.
meanings.sent5: The detective's ability to foreknow the suspect's actions helped solve the case quickly.

meanings.sent1: The squirrel foreknows the approach of winter and starts gathering nuts early.
meanings.sent2: She always foreknows when her favorite TV show will have a new episode.
meanings.sent3: The child foreknows the arrival of the ice cream truck by listening for its jingle.
meanings.sent4: The experienced teacher can foreknow the questions students will ask during the lesson.
meanings.sent5: The farmer foreknows the rain by observing the behavior of the animals on the farm.

meanings.sent1: The weather forecaster foreknows the upcoming storm based on the radar images.
meanings.sent2: He foreknows the stock market trends and makes wise investments.
meanings.sent3: The fortune teller foreknows the winning lottery numbers but keeps them a secret.
meanings.sent4: The scientist foreknows the outcome of the experiment due to extensive research.
meanings.sent5: The economist can foreknow the impact of policy changes on the economy.
